scripts.install-all: npm i && npm run install-product && npm run install-analytics
scripts.deploy-product-dev: npm run install-product && cd src/product && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy -v
scripts.deploy-product-prod: npm run install-product && cd src/product && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy --stage prod -v
scripts.deploy-analytics-dev: npm run install-analytics && cd src/analytics && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy -v
scripts.deploy-analytics-prod: npm run install-analytics && cd src/analytics && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy --stage prod -v
scripts.metrics-prod: cd src/metrics && SLS_DEBUG=* serverless deploy --stage prod -v
